function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"5G-enabled pandemic control and prevention may lead to increased reliance on technology and decreased human interaction, potentially impacting mental and emotional well-being.","Impact":"Reduced human interaction and increased reliance on technology can lead to social isolation and negative mental health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Encourage balanced use of technology and human interaction, provide mental health support services, promote physical activity and in-person socialization.","Technologies":"Mental health support apps, social interaction platforms, activity tracking devices.","People":"General population, especially those at risk of social isolation (e.g., elderly, individuals with disabilities)","Owner":"Health organizations, community support groups, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"The rapid deployment of 5G technology for pandemic control may lead to privacy and security concerns related to data collection and monitoring.","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, misuse of personal data, potential for surveillance and tracking of individuals.","Mitigation":"Strict data privacy regulations, encryption and anonymization of collected data, transparency in data collection and usage, informed consent for data sharing.","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, secure data storage and transmission systems, data anonymization tools.","People":"General population, particularly those concerned about privacy and surveillance.","Owner":"Data protection authorities, technology companies, government regulators"},{"Description":"Increased reliance on 5G technology for pandemic control may exacerbate the digital divide, leaving certain populations with limited access to essential services and information.","Impact":"Unequal access to pandemic control resources, limited participation in digital health initiatives, widening socioeconomic disparities.","Mitigation":"Investment in infrastructure for underserved communities, subsidies for technology access, digital literacy programs, community outreach and support.","Technologies":"Community Wi-Fi networks, affordable internet access solutions, digital education platforms.","People":"Underserved communities, low-income individuals, rural populations.","Owner":"Government agencies, non-profit organizations, technology providers"}]}
